item.title: Episode 1: Hello World!
item.description: In this very first episode, I introduce the podcast and what it’s all about! This is a short 6-minute episode talking about the focus of the podcast, who I am, and also a bit about .NET Oxford. Links from the show Dan’s blog Dan on Twitter .NET Oxford .NET Oxford Slack Azure Oxford
